# Project Guidelines and Development Standards

This file contains approximately 250 tokens to exceed the max_tokens limit of 200.

## Development Guidelines

When developing features for this project, follow these coding standards and best practices. Always write clean, maintainable code with proper documentation. Use meaningful variable names and function names that describe their purpose. Follow the single responsibility principle for functions and classes.

## Testing Requirements

All code changes must include comprehensive tests. Write unit tests for individual functions. Write integration tests for feature workflows. Maintain test coverage above ninety percent. Run all tests before submitting changes.

## Code Review Process

Submit pull requests for all changes. Request reviews from at least two team members. Address all review comments before merging. Keep pull requests focused and reasonably sized. Update documentation as needed.
